imdb.title: Isekai Shokudô
imdb.plot: A chef runs a restaurant that serves as a Portal between our World & a Fantasy land every 7 Days, where he serves Western Style Food to Elves, Demons, Dragons & more.

episodes.title: Hamburger/Beef Tendon Curry
episodes.plot: Jack, Kento, and Terry, three juvenile boys and best friends from a town in the Empire, regularly visit the Nekoya through their personal secret entrance to partake in its hamburger menu; the restaurant's extremely diverse clientele inspires them to become adventurers and explore the world once they come of age. After the rest of the day's customers are gone, Alphonse Flügel encourages Aletta and Kuro to participate in a trial of the Master's latest curry dish variants.

episodes.title: Bîfu Shuchû. Môningu
episodes.plot: A legendary dragon's most prized treasure lies on the other side of a certain door. A starving Aletta wanders into the Restaurant to Another World and believes herself to be dreaming, but she's in for a shock when she wakes up the next morning.

episodes.title: Menchi Katsu. Ebi Furai
episodes.plot: Treasure hunter Sarah traces her great-grandfather's footsteps to a mysterious door in an abandoned mine. Heinrich must call for help when the fortress where he's stationed is under siege by monsters, but he desperately needs food to make it.

episodes.title: Mîto Sôsu. Chokorêto Pafe
episodes.plot: Thomas is lauded as a culinary genius, but there's an unimaginable secret to his success. Princess Adelheid has childhood memories of eating clouds.

episodes.title: Omuraisu. Tôfu Sutêki
episodes.plot: A lizardman hero braves the door to another world to carry on his tribe's tradition. An elf requests a vegan dish.

episodes.title: Sandwiches, Steamed Potato with Butter
episodes.plot: The diners argue over which dish makes the best sandwich. The master teaches Aletta a new way to cook potatoes.

episodes.title: Curry Rice, Chicken Curry
episodes.plot: A shipwrecked man and an ancient dragon find companionship at Nekoya.

episodes.title: Hamburg Steak, Assorted Cookies
episodes.plot: A mermaid introduces a fisherman to the Restaurant to Another World. Aletta finds a second job.

episodes.title: Fried Seafood, Melon Soda Float
episodes.plot: Two dwarves enjoy otherworldly alcohol and fried seafood. A prince has fallen for the princess he met at Nekoya.

episodes.title: Crêpes, Natto Spaghetti
episodes.plot: Fairies investigate a disturbance in their land. Fardania visits a fellow gourmand and old friend of her father's.

episodes.title: Carpaccio, Curry Bun
episodes.plot: A pair of sirens discover a door to Nekoya while scoping out Chimera Killer Island for a new nest, but the two birdbrains could cause trouble.

episodes.title: Pork Soup, Croquettes
episodes.plot: The half-elf mercenary Alexander visits Nekoya, and the beginning of the connection between the two worlds comes to light.
